name: ui/page-container
title: Page Container
description: Most important and used block. Basic container that is also responsive.

banner.name: Is a Banner
banner.description: Setting to true makes this block a banner. All contents will be shifted right.

bgcolor.name: Background Color
bgcolor.description: Background color for the tile. These come from the Material UI palette. For more info: https://material-ui.com/customization/palette/

mb.name: Margin Bottom
mb.description: Margin bottom. This comes from Material UI and is responsive. For more info: https://material-ui.com/customization/spacing/

mt.name: Margin Top
mt.description: Margin top. This comes from Material UI and is responsive. For more info: https://material-ui.com/customization/spacing/

pb.name: Padding Bottom
pb.description: Padding bottom. This comes from Material UI and is responsive. For more info: https://material-ui.com/customization/spacing/

pt.name: Padding Top
pt.description: Padding top. This comes from Material UI and is responsive. For more info: https://material-ui.com/customization/spacing/
